column2: CycleSilicon Inc. Employee Bike Purchase Dataset – Part 1: Data Cleaning, Preparation and EDA by Dumisani Maxwell Mukuchura

This project creates a synthetic employee dataset for CycleSilicon Inc., a fictional tech?bike company inspired by the cycling cultures of Silicon Valley. It will be utilized to practice Excel Skills in Data Cleaning - emoving duplicates, standardizing text, parsing dates, handling blanks—laying the groundwork for Part 2 (PivotTables, formulas, dashboards). It will also explore preliminary Exploratory Data Analysis
Synthetic dataset created in-house for CycleSilicon Inc by AI
Unique numeric identifier for each employee, Integer
Marital status code: S- Single, M-Married, D-Divorced, W-Widowed
Indicates if the employee owns a home
Indicates if the employee owns a car
Date employee left (blank, date or “Present” if still employed)
Did the employee purchase a company bike?
Satisfaction score for bike (1 = least, 5 = most)
